title: Grand Prairie Stadium to host season two of Major League Cricket
body:
Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) has announced that tickets for the highly anticipated 2024 season are officially on sale to the general public via tickets.majorleaguecricket.com.

Fans nationwide are encouraged to act fast and secure tickets after sell-out crowds in the League’s inaugural 2023 season and 2024 pre-sale tickets in high demand following the recent season schedule announcement.

The ﬁerce competition between the six teams in the MLC will ignite Friday, July 5th, when 2023 champions MI New York take on the Seattle Orcas in an unmissable rematch at Morrisville, NC, at 3:30 PM EDT, followed by the Texas Super Kings vs. LA Knight Riders at Grand Prairie Stadium, TX, at 7:30 PM CDT.

The opening weekend will see Washington Freedom facing MI New York on Saturday, July 6th, at 3:00 pm EDT, and the San Francisco Unicorns vs. LA Knight Riders on Sunday, July 7th at Grand Prairie Stadium, TX, at 7:30 PM CDT.

You might also like | Exclusive: Cricket’s emergence as the new American dream: MLC’s Justin Geale and Royal’s Abhinav Arora on their MLC Partnership

The tournament will roll into three weeks of nonstop T20 action, featuring international stars and the nation’s top domestic talent putting on a show. With the likes of Glenn Maxwell (Washington Freedom), Jake Fraser-McGurk (San Francisco Unicorns), Nicholas Pooran (MI New York), Imad Wasim (Seattle Orcas), Devon Conway (Texas Super Kings), and Andre Russell (LA Knight Riders), this season promises unforgettable moments for fans of all ages.

Tickets for all matches, including the four playoffs, are available online through the Official Cognizant Major League Cricket website. In addition to the world-class matches, fans have several ticket options to choose from, with general admission tickets starting at $30 per person. The season’s excitement extends beyond the pitch, with entertainment, ﬁreworks, free giveaways, player signings and meet-and-greets, merchandise giveaways, food trucks, and samples throughout the tournament.

The MLC has released an exclusive offer for cricket fans – Buy One, Get One Free matches featuring Seattle Orcas vs. LA Knight Riders on July 9 and Washington Freedom vs. San Francisco Unicorns on July 22.

Both matches will begin at 7:30 PM CDT at Grand Prairie Stadium, TX. This offer is perfect for families and large groups of friends who want to enjoy a perfect summer evening of cricket. It’s also an excellent opportunity for fans to introduce their friends to the sport.

For those wanting more, tournament passes are available to ensure guaranteed access to all matches – including the hotly contested playoff series. Premium hospitality tickets are also available, with VIP seating and boxes available, which include food and beverage packages designed for hosting guests in style.

Cognizant Major League Cricket’s CEO, Vijay Srinivasan, said the demand for presale tickets demonstrated the league’s presence has made an impact on the American cricket community

Vijay Srinivasan, Cognizant Major League Cricket’s CEO, said, “The enthusiasm for cricket in America is increasing rapidly, and we are delighted to provide fans across the nation the opportunity to witness top-tier cricket live in their own backyard.”

“We are gathering the world’s top players and organizing a spectacular event in the largest sporting market globally. The success of the ﬁrst season has given us a foundation to establish one of the premier T20 leagues in the world, and our goal is to keep expanding the sport in the United States and offer the community an opportunity to engage with it, whether as fans or participants.

“We are pleased to announce the tickets on sale for season two and encourage our fans to get their tickets quickly to ensure they don’t miss out on the action,” Srinivasan added.

Off the back of Major League Cricket’s ﬁrst successful season and a momentum boost anticipated from the ICC T20 World Cup in the U.S. in June – the 2024 season is primed to reach new heights with cricket fever to captivate the US this summer.

title: Shakib Al-Hasan Joins Los Angeles Knight Riders For The 2024 Major League Cricket In USA
body:
Cricket is quickly gaining popularity in the United States with the Major League Cricket (MLC) T20 tournament incorporated in the 2022-23 season. Now the league is entering the second season and looking to add more star power to attract more fans and increase the intensity of the tournament. LA Knight Riders have roped in Bangladesh’s All-rounder Shakib Al-Hasan. He played in the Bangladesh Premier League (BPL) and the Indian Premier League (IPL). With a stellar international career, Shakib Al-Hasan will be a great addition to the side that already has players like Andre Russell, Sunil Narine and Jason Roy in their squad. APL 2024: Know Teams, Schedule, Auction Details, Live Streaming and Telecast Viewing Option of Andhra Premier League Season Three.

Shakib Al-Hasan Joins LA Knight Riders

title: Shakib Al Hasan Set to Create Another First in Major League Cricket
body:
Shakib Al Hasan has been part of many historic moments throughout his career. Currently, his team is in the United States for the World Cup, and Shakib has received some delightful news. The world-renowned all-rounder stands on the brink of another first: he is set to become the first Bangladeshi cricketer to debut in Major League Cricket (MLC).

For the second season of America's franchise T20 tournament, Major League Cricket, Shakib has signed with the Los Angeles Knight Riders. The franchise confirmed on Friday that they have directly signed Shakib. The second season of Major League Cricket will commence on July 4th, and ahead of this, Shakib inked his contract with the Los Angeles Knight Riders.

The team, owned by Shah Rukh Khan, has also signed notable players like Andre Russell, Sunil Narine, Jason Roy, Spencer Johnson, Unmukt Chand, Ali Khan, Saif Badar, Nitish Kumar, Shadley van Schalkwyk, and local cricketers Deron Davis, Matthew Tromp, Corné Dry, and Aditya Ganesh.

Bangladesh's star all-rounder will join these cricketers to light up the second season of Major League Cricket. Shakib has previously won the Indian Premier League (IPL) twice, in 2012 and 2014, with the Kolkata Knight Riders.

Shakib debuted in the IPL with Shah Rukh Khan's team in 2011. Over his IPL career, he has played 71 matches, scored 793 runs with two fifties, and taken 63 wickets. Now, Knight Riders fans are eagerly waiting to see how he performs in another franchise cricket league as a member of the same franchise.

The Los Angeles Knight Riders, Kolkata Knight Riders in the IPL, Trinbago Knight Riders in the Caribbean Premier League (CPL), and Abu Dhabi Knight Riders in the International League T20 (ILT20) are all teams under the same franchise.

title: Los Angeles Knight Riders Sign Shakib Al Hasan For MLC Season 2
body:
Los Angeles Knight Riders: Los Angeles Knight Riders (LAKR) have signed Bangladesh all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan for the upcoming second season of the Major League Cricket (MLC), the American franchise-run T20 league.

LAKR in a photo posted on social media ‘X’ wrote, “Shakib Al Hasan joins LA Knight Riders for the 2024 Major League Cricket in USA.”

Knight Riders retained Sunil Narine—the star of KKR's incredible run at the top of the league in the current IPL 2024. Andre Russell, Jason Roy, Spencer Johnson, Unmukt Chand, Ali Khan, Saif Badar, Nitish Kumar, and Shadley van Schalkwyk are also in the squad. They have also brought in local players Derone Davis, Matthew Tromp, Cirne Dry, and Adithya Ganesh for the next campaign.

Trending

LAKR came last in the 2023 MLC, the inaugural season. LAKR is owned by the parent body of Kolkata Knight Riders in the IPL which also owns the Abu Dhabi Knight Riders, in the ILT20, and the Trinbago Knight Riders men and women in the CPL.

The match between MI New York and Seattle Orcas, the winners and runners-up of the first tournament, will kick off the second edition on July 5. The 29th of July will mark the final.

This year's MLC player draft took place on March 21. To fill out the rosters of the six teams, a second draft is scheduled for June 16.

Cricket Scorecard

title: LOS ANGELES KNIGHT RIDERS SIGN SHAKIB AL HASAN FOR MAJOR LEAGUE CRICKET SEASON 2
body:
Los Angeles Knight Riders (LAKR) have made a significant signing by securing the services of Bangladesh all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan for the upcoming second season of Major League Cricket (MLC), the American franchise-run T20 league.

Shakib's inclusion adds substantial experience and skill to the LAKR squad, enhancing their prospects in the competition. His presence is expected to bolster both the batting and bowling departments, making LAKR a formidable contender in the league. This signing reflects the growing global appeal of Major League Cricket and its ability to attract top cricketing talent from around the world.

title: Major League Cricket (MLC) season 2 2024 tickets price and ticket online booking details
body:
Here is how fans can buy tickets for the Major League Cricket season 2 for Texas and Morrisville matches along with the MLC 2024 tickets price

Another exciting cricket tournament is on its way and is around the corner. As the sport is gaining popularity outside India, in America, and Major League Cricket (MLC) has asked fans to grab the tickets as soon as possible for the much-awaited 2024 season, which begins on Wednesday.

The second season of Major League Cricket will kick off on July 5 and feature six additional league matches. Grand Prairie, Texas will host a four-game playoff series following the league round.

Major League Cricket (MLC) season 2 2024 tickets price and ticket online booking details details

Three weeks of the action-packed Twenty20 cricket action featuring the best domestic and international players in the nation will mark the competition’s conclusion.

The 2023 World Cup winners, Travis Head, Glenn Maxwell, and Steve Smith of Australia, will also play for the Ricky Ponting-coached Washington Freedom squad.

Seasonal excitement extends beyond the field; food trucks, samples, giveaways of products, player meet-and-greets, fireworks, entertainment and freebies will all be present during the event.

Advertisement

The fans of the sport may look forward to two unique events that the MLC has announced namely, on July 9, Seattle Orcas will take on LA Knight Riders, and on July 22, Washington Freedom will take on San Francisco Unicorns. There is just one match for which tickets can be purchased.

Fans around the world are encouraged to move forward and secure the tickets for the 2024 season following the League’s inaugural season in 2023 sold out in record time and the season schedule was just revealed.

Advertisement

Major League Cricket season 2 tickets and prices

A media statement stated that the league’s inaugural season in 2023 was completely sold out and that pre-sale tickets for the 2024 season were in high demand following the recent announcement of the season schedule.

Online ticket purchases for all games, including the four playoffs, are available on the official Cognizant Major League Cricket website.

In addition to the elite matches, fans have a variety of ticket options to choose from, with general admission tickets starting at $30 per person.

Advertisement

Tournament passes are available for those who want more, ensuring that every game; including the hotly contested playoff series; is attended. Additionally, tickets are available for premium hospitality, which includes VIP boxes, food and drink packages, and space for elegant entertaining.
